subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Red Sox lost for the sixth time in seven games, wasting an eighth-inning lead when Adam Loewen’s two-run single off Daniel Bard lifted the Toronto Blue Jays to a 5-4 win Wednesday.
snippet: The Red Sox lost for the sixth time in seven games, wasting an eighth-inning lead when Adam Loewen’s two-run single off Daniel Bard lifted the Toronto Blue Jays to a 5-4 win Wednesday.
